action.description: The action to display in the card header.

avatar.description: The Avatar for the Card Header.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

component.description:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a DOM element or a component.

disableTypography.description:
If `true`, `subheader` and `title` won't be wrapped by a Typography component.
This can be useful to render an alternative Typography variant by wrapping
the `title` text, and optional `subheader` text
with the Typography component.

subheaderTypographyProps.description:
These props will be forwarded to the subheader
(as long as disableTypography is not `true`).

title.description: The content of the Card Title.

titleTypographyProps.description:
These props will be forwarded to the title
(as long as disableTypography is not `true`).

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.avatar: Styles applied to the avatar element.
descriptions.action: Styles applied to the action element.
descriptions.content: Styles applied to the content wrapper element.
descriptions.title: Styles applied to the title Typography element.
descriptions.subheader: Styles applied to the subheader Typography element.
